title: have a champion your bad at but still love to play anyways?

replies.body:
{{champion:92}} 
Sad but it's true.. 50/50 chance ill feed or get fed.
If I feed I go like 1/8 with just a {{item:3074}}, an old shoe {{item:1001}} , a ward{{item:2044}}, and a potato. But I still have fun when feeding :c...
If I get fed it's gonna be a complete bloodbath..

I once carried a game as Riven after feeding both the enemy top and jungler, and they dc'd

true story

> [{quoted}](name=Kitty Darkstar,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mjEmjFhW,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-06-27T23:23:08.068+0000)
>
> I once carried a game as Riven after feeding both the enemy top and jungler, and they dc'd
> 
> true story

Try again when your jungler refuses to gank your 0/1 lane that can easily be recovered. In a 5v5 no afks. But sometimes you just can't fight em.
I have too much pride to get my jungler involved in my mistakes lol. But I probably should ask for help when the enemy jungler is camping me.

{{champion:45}} I LOVE his Elite Boss skin, but I am going to have to shelve him in Ranked. I just can't seem to get wins with him. I actually win my lane every game with him, but late game I can't seem to every get in range to do anything.
I would say {{champion:157}} and maybe {{champion:268}}, not my worst champs by far though. that award goes to {{champion:7}} and {{champion:28}}. those two... it gets ugly ;__;
{{champion:24}} He is just so fun late game. I just started playing him yesterday. All 6 (I think?) games I was completely destroyed in lane lol.
Whenever I just feel like dicking around with my friends on League, I play {{champion:12}}. I just knock away every single kill and ims like "I DO GOOD TEAM :D"

> [{quoted}](name=JAGMAG,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mjEmjFhW,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-06-28T03:20:03.998+0000)
>
> go fuck yourself*

Did you mean: Yo guck fourself?
Including searches for: Fo Yuck Gourself

{{champion:122}} 

I main {{champion:75}} and they have completely opposite playstyles (early game) so I underestimate myself way too often in lane when playing Darius, but they are both splitpushers and god dammit its fun to dunk.

{{champion:268}} 

Was so hyped for his release, and instantly wanted to get good with him since he looked so fun. Lets just say I never did get good with him, but I will play him mid occasionally in normals. Even if I do fail with him.
{{champion:117}} I wouldn't blame you guys if you saw me with this and dodged, but god damn I love to play as lulu.
{{champion:238}} this man is 75 getting fed 25 suckking like a retarded monkey lacking a brain
